attributes.action: Allow parents to get their children from their classrooms
attributes.additional_details: I went to samworth enterprise academy today to collect my children from school the parents wasnt allow to collect children from the classroom this caused a lot of mayhem and stress for parents us parents are to leave are children at the school gates in the morning alone with other children I think this is very wrong what if something was to happen to a child
attributes.background: Samworth enterprise is not allowing parents to collect children from their classrooms
